channel.title: Afghan Heros
channel.description:
hello out there I'm here to talk to you guys about a server i'm hoping to gain help by you guys out there who doesn't mind helping for free i'm only looking to make this server for the perpose of trying to help the charity for Afghan Heroes. i was hoping to gets a forums up and running and then the server but at this time i'm not sure what sort of server people these days like has it can change every day-week.
If i was going to make one i would need alot of help to gain a very good comunity of players and for donations all donations will go to www.afghanheroes.org.uk.
I know you guys are out there saying what on earth is this knob doing but i want to make a change so you can still have fun and change soem people's life.
if you wont to talk to me and you have msn add me brandon.darby@ntlworld.com
Thanks for having a good reed. SORRY FOR MY SPELLING i'm toutch typing

item.title: Afghan Heros
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

I find it totally disrespectful that you are calling your server this due to the fact that I know non of your profits will be going to any of the family’s who have had disaster strike their familys. Also its disrespectful to give money earned in this manor to those family’s and troops. Thats like selling crack and giving the money to a vet. So on behalf of me go fuck yourself.

Read full topic
